## Description {#details}

This file defines the Pass Instrumentation classes that provide instrumentation points into the pass execution by PassManager.

There are two main classes:
<ul>
<li>PassInstrumentation provides a set of instrumentation points for pass managers to call on.</li>
<li>PassInstrumentationCallbacks registers callbacks and provides access to them for PassInstrumentation.</li>
</ul>


PassInstrumentation object is being used as a result of PassInstrumentationAnalysis (so it is intended to be easily copyable).

Intended scheme of use for Pass Instrumentation is as follows:
<ul>
<li>register instrumentation callbacks in PassInstrumentationCallbacks instance. PassBuilder provides helper for that.</li>
<li>register PassInstrumentationAnalysis with all the PassManagers. PassBuilder handles that automatically when registering analyses.</li>
<li>Pass Manager requests PassInstrumentationAnalysis from analysis manager and gets PassInstrumentation as its result.</li>
<li>Pass Manager invokes PassInstrumentation entry points appropriately, passing StringRef identification (&quot;name&quot;) of the pass currently being executed and IRUnit it works on. There can be different schemes of providing names in future, currently it is just a <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/smeabipass-cpp/#a8f8f80d37794cde9472343e4487ba3eb">name()</a> of the pass.</li>
<li>PassInstrumentation wraps address of IRUnit into <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">llvm::Any</a> and passes control to all the registered callbacks. Note that we specifically wrap &#39;const IRUnitT&#42;&#39; so as to avoid any accidental changes to IR in instrumenting callbacks.</li>
<li>Some instrumentation points (BeforePass) allow to control execution of a pass. For those callbacks returning false means pass will not be executed.</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class provides instrumentation entry points for the Pass Manager,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="comment">/// doing calls to callbacks registered in PassInstrumentationCallbacks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/passinstrumentation/#a405394a2ffc8cc85cd6e6be0e64d1408">PassInstrumentation</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Template argument PassT of PassInstrumentation::runBeforePass could be two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// kinds: (1) a regular pass inherited from PassInfoMixin (happen when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// creating a adaptor pass for a regular pass); (2) a type-erased PassConcept</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// created from (1). Here we want to make case (1) skippable unconditionally</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// since they are regular passes. We call PassConcept::isRequired to decide</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// for case (2).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PassT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">has&#95;required&#95;t = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(std::declval&lt;PassT &amp;&gt;().isRequired());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
